thread.title: ​Chinese Companies Head Back to the Bond Market

author: Shen Hong
title: ​Chinese Companies Head Back to the Bond Market
text: SHANGHAI—A strong rally in China’s bond market helped push fundraising by companies to its highest level in 19 months in March, giving Beijing some respite as it tries to ward off a potential economic slowdown while reducing the country’s high level of financial risk. A sweeping official campaign to end years of excessive credit growth   WSJ City: Hedge Fund Giant Feels the Fee Squeeze, How Fast Can the Global Economy Go?
